home.title: Your Intelligent Builder for Interactive Family Tree
home.description: Map your roots, discover your legacy, and see how you're part of a much bigger picture
home.connect-title: Union your tree with another one

features.title: Features
features.description: Uncover the full of advantages that KinGrid offers with its robust and feature-rich platform

effortless-building.title: Effortless Building
effortless-building.description: Forget complex charts and tedious data entry. KinGrid's intuitive tools make building your family tree surprisingly simple and deeply rewarding

online-connection.title: Online Connection
online-connection.description: Your family story doesn't end with the relatives you know. With KinGrid's Global Family Network, you can find and connect with branches of your family tree you never knew existed, anywhere in the world

many-tools.title: Many Tools
many-tools.description: Building a family tree is just the beginning. KinGrid provides you with a full workshop of powerful, easy-to-use tools to research, enrich, and share your family's narrative. This isn't just charting names — it's about understanding lives

user-friendly-interface.title: User-Friendly Interface
user-friendly-interface.description: Designed for both beginners and professionals. KinGrid's intuitive interface simplifies traditional genealogy software, allowing you to focus on what truly matters: discovering your heritage and connecting with it

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Explore our flexible subscription plans designed to meet your trading needs

reviews.title: What Customer Says
reviews.description: Discover the Voice of Satisfaction: Testimonials that Speak Volumes

partners.title: Over 100+ partners
partners.description: Expanding Horizons: Joining Forces with 100+ Trusted Partners Worldwide
